他每次见到你
整个人就亮了起来

translation.en: So good, huh?
He's great. He's just been out of work lately.
translation.zh: 他很棒 只是最近失业了

translation.en: So we've just been marathon worrying.
So I'm not myself lately. So when your father--
translation.zh:
我最近常常失控
所以当令尊...

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it.
So did you tell Terry about what happened to you?
translation.zh: 你有告诉泰莉这件事吗？

translation.en: I'd rather not get into that.
She bailed? You should go call...
translation.zh: 她不玩了？你应该打电话...

translation.en: ...another girl. Distract yourself. Right?
translation.zh:
她不玩了？你应该打电话... 给另一个女孩
转移目标 对吧？

translation.en: Forward motion.
They can't stop girls from talking to you.
translation.zh: 他们可阻止不了女孩跟你讲话

translation.en: My God, is that it? They're directing people...
translation.zh:
天哪 是吗？
他们会指示别人

translation.en: ...not to talk to me?
I had to sign a confidentiality statement where I'm liable financially if I....
translation.zh:
我得签保密声明
因为我在财务上有法律责任

translation.en: With this new situation-- You know what?
translation.zh: 现在情势不同了 你懂吧？

translation.en: The hell with everything! So I lose my job.
translation.zh: 管它去死啦！失业就失业吧

translation.en: Wait, honey, I can't. "Honey." Sorry. My medical would lapse.
translation.zh:
等等 亲爱的 不行啊
抱歉 我的药效退了 我得为宝宝着想
艾尔还没有求婚...

translation.en: I've gotta care for my baby. Al still hasn't proposed....
translation.zh:
我得为宝宝着想
艾尔还没有求婚...

translation.en: You won't lose your job, Annie, okay? All right? Don't tell me anything.
translation.zh:
你不会失业的 安妮
好吗？什么都别告诉我

translation.en: Sorry, boss.
Thanks a lot.
You have a good night, Annie.
I am just dying for you.
That's a little extreme.
Just be nauseous for me.
Yeah. A little morning sick for me.
Not a problem.
-Hello? -Hi. Lisa. This is George.
George Madison.
I.... I'm not sure how to further identify myself.
translation.zh:
我不确定如何才能
进一步确认我的身份

translation.en: Your voice sounds a little familiar.
translation.zh: 你的声音听起来有点熟悉

translation.en: I made this incredibly stupid phone call to you a few days ago.
translation.zh:
我几天前
打了通超愚蠢的电话给你

translation.en: Oh, right. How you doing, George?
translation.zh: 我想起来了 你好吗 乔治？

translation.en: Would you like to have dinner?
translation.zh: 你愿意与我共进晚餐吗？

translation.en: -But aren't you...? -No, I am not.
-You see-- -You don't have to explain.
I'm sort of seeing somebody, but we can have a meal.
translation.zh:
我有对象了
但我们吃顿饭还可以

translation.en: -When? -Anytime.
Tomorrow's clear.
-Triplo Due? -I'll meet you there.
-It's Triple Two in English. -It's gotta be early, 6:00. I'm in training.
translation.zh:
-三二餐厅
-要约六点 我在做训练

translation.en: Okay. So it's a d-- It's a date.
-Okay. -All right.
-I have made a date. -Bye.
Good night.
Come on, come on.
Georgie. George.
-Let's go inside. -I have a date.
Date? Son, we are in a rapidly evolving situation here.
translation.zh:
约会？儿子
现在的情势说变就变

translation.en: I must tell you, I was afraid to use the telephone.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 我不敢用电话

translation.en: Because?
No. No, no. Don't tell me.
I'm not ready to take on anything that I can't handle.
translation.zh:
我还没准备好
接受我无法面对的事

translation.en: No, you know what? I know exactly how to handle this.
translation.zh:
不 你知道吗？
我很清楚该怎么处理

translation.en: I'll treat myself like a company in trouble.
translation.zh:
我会把自己当做一间
有麻烦的公司对待

translation.en: What I think is you are just indulging in a lot of neuroses.
translation.zh: 我认为你是陷入了一片恐慌

translation.en: You take on too much, it becomes about how much...
translation.zh:
当你负担太多
重点就变成你能处理多少

translation.en: ...instead of how well you handle it. That applies now.
translation.zh:
而不是你能处理得多好
现在正是如此

translation.en: -Stand still! -No.
You do not have the luxury of not hearing this.
translation.zh: 你没那个闲功夫不听这件事

translation.en: Are you making me literally run from bad news?
translation.zh: 你是要逼我逃离坏消息吗？

translation.en: The chickenshit board has dec--
I gotta go. I have a date.
translation.zh: 我要走了 我有约会

translation.en: What happened to you was horrific.
translation.zh: 你的遭遇真是太可怕了

translation.en: -Stop acting tough. -It's the worst move!
translation.zh:
-别再逞强了
-这是最糟的决定！ 看看几点了

translation.en: Look at the time.
Hey, everybody, I have to leave. I have a date.
translation.zh: 各位 我必须走了 我有约会

translation.en: -What? -Now, Lise?
-Yeah. -Lisa?
Nobody's buying this.
-We should protest! -We should.
Smalls, what do you want us to do?
translation.zh: 小莎 你要我们怎么做？

translation.en: -Lisa. -Okay. There is one thing.
translation.zh: 丽莎 好吧 有一件事

translation.en: When I come to visit you at training camp when you're getting ready...
translation.zh: 我去训练营看你们的时候

translation.en: ...just don't feel funny talking to me.
translation.zh: 不要觉得跟我讲话怪怪的

translation.en: Okay? Don't feel sad for me.
translation.zh: 好吗？不要为我感到难过

translation.en: Because my biggest fear is that you won't be yourselves around me.
translation.zh:
因为我最大的恐惧就是
有我在你们就反常

translation.en: I've seen that, and if that happened, it would just make me feel like I--
translation.zh:
我见过那种事
那样会让我觉得...

translation.en: Like I didn't know you anymore.
And I want to.
I need to.
Just say, "Okay, Lisa."
Okay, Lisa.
God. I--
I gotta go. I gotta go. He's waiting for me.
translation.zh: 我该走了 他在等我呢

translation.en: -I love you. -Love you. Love you.
-Love you too. -Go, Lise.
-Go, Lise. -Lise!
-Hi. -Name, please.
I'm meeting George....
-Madison? -I'm not sure. I forget.
translation.zh:
-麦迪森吗？
-我不确定 我忘了

translation.en: Could that be him over there?
I'll bet that is him.
That's the sort of day I'm having.
You don't have to take me. Thank you, though.
translation.zh: 你不用带位了 谢谢

translation.en: George?
Are you George?
I'm Lisa.
-Very good of you to join me. -Yeah.
How you doing?
How are you doing?
I'm great.
-Yeah? -Yep.
Well, treasure it.
You okay?
No. I'm sorry, I'm not even aware that--
translation.zh: 不好 对不起 我甚至没发现...

translation.en: I have to apologize. This might not be the best first impression.
translation.zh:
我必须道歉
这恐怕不是最好的第一印象

translation.en: I.... I had...
...an unusual 24 hours.
Okay. Well, the bad days make the good ones better.
translation.zh: 好 坏日子会让好日子更好

translation.en: So don't worry about it.
Is this an Italian restaurant?
Yes, it's a very good one.
Oh, yeah, it looks good.
-Let's get a drink. -None for me.
You know what? You're right. Yeah. I shouldn't drink.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？你是对的
对 我不应该喝酒

translation.en: -Don't let me stop you. -No, no, no.
Believe me, drinking too much two nights in a row could be a mistake.
translation.zh:
相信我 连续两晚喝太多酒
会出错的

translation.en: I haven't had anything since lunch yesterday, so I'm starving.
translation.zh:
我昨天中午过后就没吃东西
所以我饿坏了

translation.en: You don't drink at all?
-I follow my father's rule on drinking. -Which is?
translation.zh:
-我遵照我爸的喝酒规矩
-怎么说？

translation.en: Never drink to feel better. Only drink to feel even better.
translation.zh:
绝不借酒浇愁
只为好事喝酒助兴

translation.en: That's fantastic.
Yep. It's a good one.
That's great. But sometimes I think that...
translation.zh: 真好 但有时候我认为

translation.en: ...one drink can give you a little better perspective.
translation.zh: 一杯酒可以让你有更棒的视野

translation.en: Not for me. I guess it depends on the person.
translation.zh: 我不会 我想这因人而异吧

translation.en: Look, if you wanna have a drink, have a drink. Keeping talking about it--
translation.zh: 你想喝酒就喝 继续讲下去...

translation.en: I don't need permission to drink. If I want a drink, I'll order one.
translation.zh:
我喝酒不需要人批准
我想喝自己会叫

translation.en: Jesus! Do you know I don't know you?
translation.zh: 天哪！你知道我根本不认识你吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm not good today.
translation.zh: 对不起 我今天心情不好

translation.en: Maybe I should say what's going on. I never talk about myself. I should.
translation.zh:
也许我该说出发生了什么事
我从没聊过自己的事 我应该说的

translation.en: No! Don't do that.
George, this is what I'm suggesting. That we eat.
translation.zh: 乔治 我的建议是 我们用餐

translation.en: And that we don't work at this conversation.
translation.zh: 不要努力想着要聊什么

translation.en: -Let's just cut ourselves a break... -Yes.
...and give ourselves permission to be quiet.
For the whole dinner. Completely quiet.
translation.zh: 整顿饭都完全的不要说话

translation.en: Can I talk to the waiter?
translation.zh: 我可以跟服务生说话吗？

translation.en: As long as you don't tell him about your day.
translation.zh: 只要你别跟他提你今天的事

translation.en: I mean, that....
That was just what I needed.
You take care of yourself.
I'm just leaving my place to go to dinner.
translation.zh: 我正要离开住处去吃饭

translation.en: -Good evening, Mr. Madison. Taxi? -Yes, thank you, Tom.
translation.zh:
-晚安 麦迪森先生 叫车吗？
-是 谢谢你 汤姆

translation.en: Okay, Dad, I'm ready. What happened?
translation.zh:
爸 我准备好了
发生什么事？

translation.en: What if I come by later? The phone isn't....
translation.zh: 我晚点过去吧？电话不太...

translation.en: Just tell me. I'd rather use the rest of the night processing the information.
translation.zh:
你说吧 我想用剩下的夜晚
处理这项资讯

translation.en: I'm sorry, this is private. There's still some privacy left.
translation.zh:
抱歉 这是私事
那还是有一些隐私的

translation.en: The board is refusing to pay...
-...your legal bills. Now-- -Hey.
I think I met a great girl.
translation.zh: 我想我认识了一个好女孩

translation.en: Oh, good. There is a God.
translation.zh: 很好 还有老天爷呢

translation.en: The girls needed to tell you how they felt.
translation.zh: 她们必须告诉你她们的感受

translation.en: It's something, isn't it?
Last time I saw that was when a kid died in high school...
translation.zh:
我上次看到这个情形
是有个高中生死了

translation.en: ...and they left this stuff by the road.
translation.zh: 他们把这种东西留在路边

translation.en: How about straight talk?
I am very sensitive to what you're going through.
translation.zh: 我对你经历的事很敏锐

translation.en: You know what you need most right now?
translation.zh: 你知道你现在最需要什么吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -What?
Insensitivity.
Yeah?
-Who is it? -It's Lisa.
Could you narrow it down?
I'm not kidding right now.
A good Lisa. Come here. Get in.
translation.zh: 是好人丽莎 进来吧

translation.en: -You're alone, right? -Yeah.
I was just working up the night.
Do you want me to be here?
-Yes, I do. -Okay.
Then this is what I need.
If in the middle of the night I start crying or...
...shaking or acting enormously upset, I don't want you to ask what's wrong.
translation.zh:
发抖或表现得很沮丧
你不要问我怎么了

translation.en: I want you to just ignore it. Is that okay with you?
translation.zh: 我要你别理会 你可以吗？

translation.en: -Actually, that's my preference. -Okay, good.
translation.zh: 可以 我就喜欢这样 那就好

translation.en: Have a seat. My game's coming up.
translation.zh: 坐吧 我的球赛要开始了

translation.en: Matty Reynolds gets him. The Nationals win.
translation.zh:
马提雷诺斯逮到他
国民队赢了

translation.en: -Good mechanics. -Yeah.
Okay. Let's go, I got it.
Can you afford me?
The firm is refusing to pay my legal bills, but my father is willing to help.
translation.zh:
公司拒付我的法律支出
但我爸愿意帮忙

translation.en: You can't take money from him, not with his position on the board.
translation.zh:
你不能拿他的钱
因为他是董事局的一员

translation.en: What would your retainer be?
Three hundred thousand, and another three in escrow in case it goes to trial.
translation.zh:
三十万 另外托管三十万
以防万一要打官司

translation.en: -I suppose I could sell-- -Everything you can.
translation.zh:
-我想我可以卖掉...
-你能变卖的所有东西

translation.en: Okay.
-Sit down. -I don't wanna lie down.
-I said, "Sit down." -I don't think you did.
Yes, I did. I never ask someone to lie down on a first visit.
translation.zh:
是真的 我从来不会
请初诊的人躺下

translation.en: -Sorry. -Okay.
So...
...why are you here?
I have a month left on my insurance and they pay up to six visits.
translation.zh:
我的保险还剩一个月
我可以看诊六次

translation.en: I meant, is there a difficulty?
Well....
I'm sorry. I'm gonna go because this is just stupid.
translation.zh:
抱歉 我要走了
这实在太愚蠢了

translation.en: Not that this is stupid. But I mean--
translation.zh: 我不是说你 我是说...

translation.en: Thank you for your time. Just for me, you know. I mean, not this.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的时间 我还是不看了

translation.en: -But thank you for understanding. -All right.
-Okay. -Okay.
You know, can I ask you just one stupid question?
translation.zh: 我可以问你一个蠢问题吗？

translation.en: No such thing.
Because I'm leaving and I'm not gonna do this again.
translation.zh: 因为我要走了 我也不会再来

translation.en: I was wondering if there's one general thing you've found over the years...
translation.zh:
我想知道 你这么多年来
有没有找到一件普通的事

translation.en: ...to be generally true...
...in a general way that would help anyone...
translation.zh:
可以用普通的方法
帮助任何人

translation.en: ...with any situation?
That's a great question.
Yes.
I'd say, figure out what you want and learn how to ask for it.
translation.zh:
我认为是想清楚你要什么
学会如何要求得到它

translation.en: Okay.
Those are both really hard.
Yes, but you came here, which was hard for you.
translation.zh:
是啊 但你来这里
对你来说很难

translation.en: And you're leaving right away, also hard.
translation.zh: 你马上就要走 同样也很难

translation.en: So you're tougher than you think you are right now.
translation.zh:
所以你现在
比你想像中更坚强

translation.en: Thanks.
I appreciate that.
-Good luck. -Okay.
-I can see why people do this. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-我知道大家为何这样做了
-谢谢

translation.en: I'm sorry. I thought some of them were bringing their wives.
translation.zh:
抱歉 我想他们有些人
把老婆也带来了

translation.en: That usually changes the behavior considerably.
translation.zh: 那通常会大大改变他们的行为

translation.en: The rookie who lives here had this, maybe the best barbecue anywhere...
translation.zh:
住在这里的菜鸟
他的烤肉恐怕是最棒的

translation.en: ...flown in from Houston.
He bought a first-class seat so his friend could fly it in.
translation.zh:
他买了头等舱的机位
他朋友才能带过来

translation.en: Wait till you taste it. Try the sauce first. That's how you judge.
translation.zh:
你尝了就知道
先试它的酱才知好坏

translation.en: -This place nails it. And you know-- -No hard feelings.
translation.zh: 这里太棒了 你别生气

translation.en: You can stay, I just.... I can't do this right now.
translation.zh:
你可以留下来
但我现在没心情待在这儿

translation.en: There's Christian athletes inside. We'll eat with them.
translation.zh:
里面有基督教徒的运动员
我们跟他们一起吃

translation.en: Do you ever wonder what's going on in my life? Because you never ask.
translation.zh:
你不好奇我怎么了吗？
你从来都不问

translation.en: I thought I wasn't supposed to. Is that just at night?
translation.zh:
我不是不能问吗？
难道说只有晚上不能问？

translation.en: This is-- You know what? What I think I mean is...
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
我想我的意思是...

translation.en: ...I should tell you what's going on with me.
translation.zh: 我应该告诉你我怎么了

translation.en: I got....
Oh, God.
I got cut.
Sorry.
Let's have some barbecue and we'll talk about it. That's....
translation.zh: 我们先吃烤肉再聊吧 那个...

translation.en: I don't wanna eat now.
I can't.
You don't wanna eat anything?
I just can't.
Okay.
I'll go with you.
Okay.
So I'm gonna go to grad school at night.
I'll have to work a few jobs, but I've got the private coaching thing...
translation.zh:
我得做几份工作
但我可以做私人教练

translation.en: ...and I lined up this part-time retail thing.
translation.zh: 还有零售业的兼职工作

translation.en: -That's great. -That's good. I got that covered.
translation.zh:
-那很好
-是啊 我应付得来

translation.en: I just have this problem with my attitude.
It's like I have to get to the place where I appreciate what the game gave me.
translation.zh: 我要感激球赛带给我的一切

translation.en: And accept and even embrace the obvious...
translation.zh:
接受 甚至于拥抱
这很明显的是...

translation.en: ...that the time comes for every athlete when they--
translation.zh: 每个运动员迟早都会遇到...

translation.en: It's never gonna come for me.
You know what? Maybe we shouldn't talk.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我们还是别说了

translation.en: Maybe we should watch TV or something.
translation.zh: 也许我们应该看电视什么的

translation.en: No, no, no. Hold on, come here.
I hear everything you're saying.
Come sit over here. I'm gonna set you down and make you something to eat.
translation.zh:
过来坐 我要让你冷静下来
弄点东西给你吃

translation.en: We get a little food in your stomach, we'll both think better.
translation.zh:
让你肚子里填些食物
我们都能想得更清楚

translation.en: You like inspirational stories?
translation.zh: 你喜欢启发人心的故事吗？

translation.en: Okay, I got one for you.
translation.zh: 好 我讲一个给你听

translation.en: I knew a really good player once, and the coach cut him.
translation.zh:
我认识一个很棒的球员
教练把他踢出来

translation.en: And the guy just felt.... He felt impotent.
Now you're probably feeling whatever the female version of that word is.
translation.zh:
你现在可能感受到
女生版的同义词

translation.en: It's the same word.
Don't let what's going on with you make you give me a hard time.
translation.zh: 别让你的情绪给我难堪

translation.en: Because that's not productive.
I'm not. It's the same word for women.
translation.zh: 我没有啊 真的是同一个词嘛

translation.en: "Impotent"?
Okay. Tie goes to the pretty one.
Same word. He was feeling impotent, just like you may be feeling.
translation.zh:
同一个词 他感到无能
你可能也有同感

translation.en: I don't think that's how I feel--
translation.zh: 我不认为那是我的感受

translation.en: Can I finish my thought?
Maybe it'll help, maybe it won't, but I'm trying.
translation.zh:
它也许帮得上忙 也许帮不上
但我在努力啦

translation.en: I'm sorry.
-That's all right. -Go ahead.
Okay. So his girlfriend had a cat and he started to save the cat's shit....
translation.zh:
好 他女朋友有养猫
他就开始囤积猫屎

translation.en: -A little trust. -Okay.
He started to save all the cat's shit, and every few days or so...
translation.zh: 他开始囤积猫屎 每隔几天...

translation.en: ...he'd take a little amount and wrap it in a different package, like a gift...
translation.zh:
他就拿一小坨
用不同的包装包起来 像礼物

translation.en: ...or a magazine roll or something you order online.
translation.zh:
或卷起来的杂志
或像在网上订的东西

translation.en: Every few days for eight months...
...he would send these cat turds to the guy who cut him.
translation.zh:
他就会把这些猫屎
寄给把他踢出球队的人

translation.en: Is that it?
Yeah, that's it. It's a great story.
translation.zh: 对 就这样 这故事很棒

translation.en: Did you understand it was the coach he sent it to?
translation.zh: 你明白他是寄给教练吗？

translation.en: To the guy who cut him? He felt impotent, and then he....
translation.zh:
把他踢出球队的人？
他感到无能 却又...

translation.en: File it away. It worked for this guy.
translation.zh:
不要放在心上
对这个人来说成功啦

translation.en: No, so he stopped when his anger went away--
translation.zh:
不是啦 所以他停止了
是因为他气消了...

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
Well, the cat died.
Oh, God.
There, a smile.
That's horrible. I didn't know the cat was gonna die.
translation.zh: 太惨了 我不知道猫会死掉

translation.en: You feel better.
Great. I hated seeing you touch bottom.
translation.zh: 太好了！我真讨厌看到你情绪低落！

translation.en: That was sweet.
Yeah, you're right.
It's okay.
-You are amazing. -You were great.
-It takes two, you know? -At least.
Creep.
Oh, boy.
You clap to bring on the lights the minute we finish?

translation.en: Why? What's the matter?
Just clapping your hands and those dumb lights makes me feel like--

你拍手加上那些蠢灯
让我觉得好像...

translation.en: Wait, wait, let me guess. I think I can get it.

translation.en: Like I'm not thinking about you.
Look who got it.
-Yeah, look who read your mind. -God.
Yeah. What should I do?

-我竟然能读你的心呢
-天哪 我该怎么做？

translation.en: God. Turn them off!
You wanna do it? Come on. Oh, it's fun.

translation.en: Grow up.
No.
It was kind of fun, wasn't it?
I'm gonna teach you how to have fun.
-You didn't see that? -What?

translation.en: -Intriguing. -Ryan. Get loose.

translation.en: Well....
-What? -I got a way.
Whenever this one thing happens, I know I'm done.

只要发生一件事
我就知道我完了

translation.en: It's personal. I don't want anyone making fun of me.

translation.en: No, no one's-- Go!
I'm in love with somebody when I wear a condom with the other girls.

当我跟其他女生做的时候
会戴保险套 就表示我恋爱了

translation.en: Holy shit, I'm in love.
Hello?
You up for a crazy idea?

translation.en: Yes.
Maybe it'd be fun if you kind of move in with me.

translation.en: Hello? Are you there?
Barely.
-Are you serious? -I know.
I told you it was crazy.
Can you give me a minute to form a thought?
translation.zh: 你可以给我一分钟想想吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. Take your time. -Okay. Thanks.
translation.zh:
-好啊 慢慢想
-好 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, I'll call you back.
That was quick.
I know, but, Lisa, listen. Today I caught myself--

我知道 但是丽莎
我今天恍神了

translation.en: Thanks, Bobby.
Today I caught myself wishing you were in the bullpen with me.
translation.zh:
我今天恍神了
竟然想象你跟我在牛棚里

translation.en: Literally having a daydream. I mean, that's serious.

translation.en: Li-- Are you there?
Hello? What are you doing?
I think I'm thinking.
Don't! You shouldn't have to think about a great idea.

别想了！这么棒的点子
你还想什么呢

translation.en: You said this was a crazy idea.
I know, I think it's both. I think part of the greatness is how crazy it is.

我知道 两者都是吧
我想它最棒的就是够疯狂

translation.en: What first popped into your mind?
translation.zh: 你听了第一个念头是什么？

translation.en: That I don't know what to say and it makes me feel stupid.
translation.zh:
我不知道该说什么
让我觉得很蠢

translation.en: Second thing.
That I've never lived with anyone before.
Great. No one's had a chance to ruin you.

太好了！
从来没人能够摧残你

translation.en: Have you ever lived with anybody?
With me you get into what does "living together" mean...

translation.en: ...and duration is a factor.
But listen, is--? Do you think...
translation.zh: 但你听我说 你觉得...

translation.en: ...this is something...? Do you wanna do this?
-Hello? -I honestly....
-Yeah? -I don't know how to figure this out.
translation.zh:
-怎样？
-我不知道怎么把它想清楚

translation.en: Is there tingling? Do you have goose bumps?
translation.zh:
你会激动吗？
有起鸡皮疙瘩吗？

translation.en: Maybe I need to work my voice a little bit until you get them.
translation.zh:
要我用声音
讲到你起鸡皮疙瘩吗？

translation.en: I think I just got them.
What?
-I think I just got them. -Yeah.
I really like you, Matty.

translation.en: Okay.
-Good phone call. -Good phone call.
translation.zh:
-这通电话打的好
-这通电话打的好

translation.en: -Right? Yeah. -Thank you.
This is such a mistake.
-Overstepping alert. -You sublet your apartment.

translation.en: You told me don't do anything halfway unless you're willing to be half happy.

你告诉我做事不要半调子
除非你愿意不上不下

translation.en: Don't make important life decisions when you are mush. It's too dangerous.
translation.zh:
不要在你愁怅的时候做出
重要的人生决定 太危险了

translation.en: Fight low self-esteem, don't give it the wheel.

要对抗低落的自尊心
不要顺水推舟

translation.en: I am packed here. I am doing this.

translation.en: So back off, or do what you always do for me, pull out some damn positives.

你要么别管 要么像以往一样
说点正面积极的话

translation.en: I'm sorry, honey.
Positives.
Hell, the guy has a 94-mile-an-hour fastball.

translation.en: He makes 14 million a year. Go get him.

他一年赚一千四百万
去抓住他吧

translation.en: -Got your bag? I cleared some space. -Yeah, I just....

-行李袋呢？我清出空间了
-有啊 我...

translation.en: -Yeah, come on in. -Okay.
Okay, I can get rid of both of these things right here.

translation.en: I'll talk to the guys downstairs. They have storage space.

我去跟楼下的人说
他们有储藏空间

translation.en: It's okay.
We'll make it work.
Hey, boss, it's me.
-Annie. -Hi. Did you call that girl?
translation.zh:
-安妮
-嗨 你打给那个女孩了吗？

translation.en: No. You don't have to bring me food. It's enough that you found this place.
translation.zh:
没有 你不必带吃的给我啦
你帮我找到这里就够了

translation.en: That was selfish. You dress up my neighborhood. Love your window?

那怎么行 你成了我的邻居啊
喜欢你的窗户吗？

translation.en: It's great.
This is--
Cooking relaxes me when I can't sleep. So why not just call her?

下厨能让我放松
你为什么不打给她？

translation.en: Honestly? Because my first impression wasn't great.
translation.zh:
说实话？因为我的第一印象
不是很好

translation.en: I'd rather be more myself when I see her next.

我希望下次见到她
可以表现得更好

translation.en: What if someone beats you to her?

translation.en: Optimism is sanity for me right now.

现在对我来说
保持乐观才是明智之举

translation.en: Please, sit down. Make yourself comfortable.

translation.en: Relax.
Look.
I'm in a funny position...
...but I know stuff about what happened at work.
I can't tell you because of that thing I signed...

我不能告诉你
因为我签了那个东西

translation.en: ...but if you start guessing, I can't help it if this face is an open book. Look!
translation.zh:
但你如果猜的话
我也难保这张脸的表情会说话

translation.en: Stop. You'd get in trouble, and just listening could be wrongdoing for me.

住手 你会有麻烦的
我就算用听的也不行

translation.en: This information is killing me!

translation.en: It's like I know someone is gonna shoot you and I can't scream:

就好像我知道有人要射杀你
我却不能大叫

translation.en: "Watch out! That man's gonna blow your frigging head off!"

〝小心！那个人要
轰掉你的脑袋了！〞

translation.en: Please play this game with me, or I'll just tell you!

拜托你陪我玩这个游戏
不然我就直接告诉你了！

translation.en: -No! -For God's sake, let me unburden!

-不行！
-看在老天的份上 让我吐露吧

translation.en: Stop! Stop! Annie, sit down, please. Sit down.

住手！住手！
安妮 拜托你坐下来

translation.en: Careful. You have to understand what this is like for me right now.

translation.en: Picture a very angry ocean. A storm. And I'm on this little tiny boat.

想像一片怒海 有暴风雨
我在这条小船上

translation.en: And miraculously, this boat is still afloat.

translation.en: And that boat is that I haven't done anything wrong.

而那艘船就是
我没做错任何事

translation.en: Like letting you say something you're legally constrained from revealing.

像是让你说出
你受法律约束不能透露的事

没有做错任何事
才让我继续浮在海面

translation.en: If I lose that, I'm gone.

-I know something about the boat. -Stop!

-我知道跟船有关的事啊
-住手！

translation.en: -It's a terrible boat! Get out of the boat! -Respect me on this!

-那是条烂船！快下船吧！
-这件事你要听我的！

I think I've guessed the same stuff you know.

translation.en: I think I know what you do.

translation.en: Nope.

你要是知道我在说什么

translation.en: Oh, I think I could.
I think I am.
-Leave it. -What if I give you a hint?

不要！别逼我逃离自己的公寓！
拜托

Thank you.

还要被别人品头论足

愤怒是有用的

有强烈的迹象显示
他们会起诉你

translation.en: George?
George?
Oh, God, please don't kid me.
How are you?
Really....
-Good to see you. -Yeah.
That's so funny.
Thanks.
-You didn't have to do that. -Yeah, I did.
So do you live in this building?
Did you leave?
Are you still here?
Yeah. Absolutely.
-Here I am. -Okay.
Sorry I'm not more hospitable. I'm in a hurry.

我可以先说吗？
我想解释为何没打给你

I think I've made a bad assumption that we've been on the same wavelength.

我想我做了很糟的假设
以为我们在同一个波段

那样完全没结果
我不是有意...

你可曾想要删除说过的话
即便你正说出口？

translation.en: -No. -No?
You're funny. You know, I'm really glad I ran into you.

translation.en: I bit your head off at dinner.

所以我很高兴可以说对不起

Yeah! I'm in the kitchen!
Hey, babe.
George, this is my boyfriend, Matty.

我要先问过你 才能邀请

我不知道食材的事
也许那会改变情形

What's this obvious thing I'm missing?

translation.en: Let's forget it. Otherwise, you want me to put my foot in the trap? Okay.

算了 难道你要我

哪来的陷阱 把话说清楚

translation.en: Okay. That this is my place.
This is my place.
Oh, boy.
So long, Matty.
Lisa, what are you doing?
Congratulations, you get your sock drawer back.

丽莎 你不能这样做

好啦 你可以请别人过来
不用先问过我

translation.en: You won't abuse the privilege. Right?

还有安全问题啊
大家都忽略了

I think I screwed up.
Not from my perspective.
Yeah, thanks, buddy.
Thanks.

-要叫车吗？
-不用了 谢谢你 汤姆

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
Do you live around here? I need to charge my phone.

你住附近吗？
我的手机要充电

translation.en: Yeah, I live pretty close.
About an hour. By bus.

translation.en: I don't wanna mislead you.
-Yeah. Okay. -Okay.
-Here. -Thanks.
-I'll take it. I got it. -Thanks.
It's an hour 10, maybe.
Hello, sir.
Yes, she just came down.
Okay, I'll try.
Sorry, sir, I just wasn't able to contact her for you.

抱歉 先生
我没办法帮您联络上她

translation.en: Man, so dead.
It's a new place. I haven't totally unpacked yet.

translation.en: -Are you hungry? -Lately? Always.

你饿吗？ 现在吗？我饿啊
干嘛问？你有吃的吗？

translation.en: Why are you asking? You got nibbles?
translation.zh:
现在吗？我饿啊
干嘛问？你有吃的吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes. Do you wanna hear a list?

translation.en: Lisa?
I'm sorry, did you say something? I was distracted.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你刚说什么？我分心了

translation.en: So was I. You wanna hear a list of what I've got?
translation.zh:
我也是 你想听听
我有什么吃的清单吗？

translation.en: -I'm not gonna be great company. -Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 我不会是个好客人 开什么玩笑？

translation.en: This is the best conversation I've had since the night we didn't talk.
translation.zh:
这是我们最棒的对话了
因为那晚我们根本没聊天

translation.en: -Well, that's sort of funny. -Flying start.
translation.zh: 这还蛮好笑的 好的开始

translation.en: Hey, what can I do to help?
You make your own pot pie?
A friend. Plates and silverware are over here.
translation.zh:
是朋友做的
盘子和餐具在这里

translation.en: Hello?
It doesn't matter where I am.
You're gonna yell at me?
That's it? That's why you called? You know what I thin--
translation.zh:
就这样？你是为了这个打来的？
你知道我...

translation.en: Wait.
You're gonna lose me.
Just as well. It wasn't gonna go well from there anyway.
translation.zh: 这样也好 反正不会有好结局

translation.en: I think we both need some time to think.
translation.zh:
我想我们两个
都需要时间思考

translation.en: -Do you have any Guinness? -I will get Guinness.
-Don't go out of your way. -No, no.
I make a great drink, if you wanna try it. It's not an idle remark, I do.

我调酒给你喝喝看
我不是说说而已 我真的会

translation.en: Okay. I'll try something. Just not too strong.
translation.zh: 好吧 我试试看 但不要太烈

translation.en: What am I doing?
Stay honest with yourself when making a mistake, there might be a takeaway.
translation.zh:
〝犯了错要诚实面对自己
也许就能找到出路〞

translation.en: I'm gonna get drunk because I'm too lame to stand how I feel.
translation.zh:
我要喝醉 因为我太无力
承受不住这些打击

translation.en: Great choice.
-Could you do me a favor? -Absolutely.
And thank you for the opportunity.
Could you not...? I have a boyfriend, so could we just...?

你可以不要那个吗？
我有男朋友 我们可不可以单纯...

translation.en: -Yes. -Really?
Yes.
I have a teammate, or an ex-teammate...

translation.en: ...who says the only time I say anything is when I drink Guinness, so watch out.

她说我只有喝了酒才会吐真言

translation.en: Well, I think you've been saying a lot without drinking.
translation.zh: 我觉得你不喝酒话也很多啊

translation.en: You are truly something.
Which means my thinking about you isn't just an aspect of the trouble I'm in.

所以我会想着你
不只是因为我惹上那些麻烦

translation.en: I don't follow you.
-You're in some sort of trouble? -No--
First things first. I'll be right back. Make yourself at home.

不 一件一件来
我马上回来 你请自便

translation.en: Okay.
Sorry.
I got it!
Okay, Lisa, if you're not back in an hour, forget it. That's it.

丽莎 你若一小时内不回来
就别回来了

translation.en: Okay, I'm removing the deadline. Any time's good.

我要删掉期限
你什么时候回来都可以

translation.en: I may have contributed to the misunderstanding.
I mean, if you could see my face, you'd see how upset I am.

你要是能看到我的脸
就会知道我有多沮丧

translation.en: Hold on, I'm gonna--
No, let me....
Turn off the lights
And light a candle
Let's take a shower
Shower together
I'll wash your body
You wash mine, yeah
Rub me down With some hot oils, baby
All right. I hope I haven't built this up too much.
translation.zh: 好了 但愿我没有让你太期待

translation.en: -Okay. Tell me what you think. -Oh, good.
It's good, right?
-It's delicious. -Thanks. My own creation.
I used to be a bartender, when I was working my way through bartending.

我以前是酒保
那时我在自学做酒保

translation.en: Oh, here. Please.
Come here. To people who make toasts.
translation.zh: 来 敬那些祝酒的人

translation.en: I just touched your leg.
I know.
So my father would rather I was more...
...dynamic. Okay?
He raised me since I was 7 because-- And wait till you hear this.

他从我七岁开始养我 因为...
你听了就知道

translation.en: People go crazy over it.
I'm serious, be prepared to see me through new eyes.

我说真的
准备透过新视野看我吧

translation.en: -Okay. -I become...
...dangerously appealing.
Yeah. You'll wanna sit up for this one.
translation.zh: 对 你要坐正了听我说

translation.en: -Okay. -Here I go. Okay.
My mother left us...
...after seeing Kramer vs. Kramer at the movies one afternoon.

在某个下午看完电影
《克莱姆夫妇》之后
